name: The Bit Prerogative
description:
A 1-bit endless runner game where you compete to get onto the high score charts! Simple 1-button controls. Created in under 48 hours by CodeNMore for 1-Bit Jam 2021 and MinJam #77.

Note: after the jam ended, a modification was made to allow the scoreboard to function on Itch.IO. This was the only change made after the game jam, and did not affect gameplay at all.

Enjoy!
